Package model

Class HotelCollection

java.lang.Object
model.HotelCollection
public class HotelCollection extends Object
This class collates hotels and contains relevant methods that require all hotels to be checeked
Author:
Sean Benedict Bernardo, Luis Andrew Madridijo

      Parameters:

      boolean whether hotel name is unique or not

      Changes hotel name
      Parameters:
      oldHotelName - name of hotel to be changed
      newHotelName - name of new hotel name
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if oldHotel is not found, newHotelName is invalid or an already existing name
